It's been "stuck" the entire time I've been downloading - around 54 hours now! For some reason the seeding has been on/off. It keeps fluctuating wildly from very slow to very fast, to nothing at all for a few minutes at a time. I've tried VPN on, off, encryption on and off, toggled up and download settings, nothing seems to make a difference. It's cherry is just about to pop, there are 220+ leechers, and like, one seed, and everyone is at 99%. Once you hit a few completed seeds, this things gonna SEED LIKE AN ANTELOPE, OUT OF CONTROL!!!!

DONE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

You know, a certain joy comes from actually being present to watch a torrent like this finish - especially one that has taken from 7:01pm on 1/4 until 12:00am on 1/7 - just under 53 hours!

Watching the last 7 seconds count down as it actually finished - EPIC! Now I have to go to bed, but this will be SO SWEET when I get to watch it over the next couple of days.

Thank you Anonymous Uploader!
